ygData.subject: RE: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ahh I missed the lower level aspect to the story.  I thought we were discussing higher levels.  Even at 19 when you first start seeing your caps move to
ygData.messageBody:
>True, but at the level you are fighting wisps for example
>a cap of 100

Ahh I missed the lower level aspect to the story. I thought
we were discussing higher levels. Even at 19 when you first
start seeing your caps move to 100, H2H still is very lacking
as my 100 H2H does not beat a level 1 monk with 5 points trained
in H2H. So even if a level 10 warrior had a 55 hand to hand and
magic fists he still wouldn't be able to beat up wisps, where
a monk of similar or lesser level could do it with little problems.
Magic fists or not, no melee type can win with just fists, except
a monk, in the lower levels.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
